content.text:
We’re the experts who fill in technical gaps on any team, whether it’s software development, systems optimization, or automation to get businesses back on track.

Since 2008, we’ve created 300+ custom software applications across five continents for numerous established companies like Microsoft, Sony, Okta, Hyperproof, Attabotics, and Paysafe, as well as many up-and-coming start-ups. 

Headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, our strategically positioned international hubs in Canada, Vietnam, and Australia foster creativity, innovation, and collaboration on a global scale. By tapping into diverse talents and regional trends, we continue to deliver solutions to our clients based on the latest developments and trends while built to North American standards. Our distributed team allows us to develop and provide our clients with the round-the-clock support they deserve.
Our Team
Your Dream Team In Tech
We’re the experts who fill in technical gaps on any team, whether it’s software development, systems optimization, or automation to get businesses back on track.

Headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, our strategically positioned international hubs in Canada, Vietnam, and Australia foster creativity, innovation, and collaboration on a global scale. By tapping into diverse talents and regional trends, we continue to deliver solutions to our clients based on the latest developments and trends while built to North American standards. Our distributed team allows us to develop and provide our clients with the round-the-clock support they deserve.
About Us
Master Coders, Innovation Leaders

When it comes to software development and systems enablement, we create source code in the form of poetry. Poeta only employs artists in software solutions whose mastery in coding is matched by an innate determination to help people worldwide.
